remarks: Eliminate ` P =/= Q ` conditions from ~ cdlemg39 .  TODO:  Fix comment. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2013.)
statement:
cdlemg35.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg35.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemg35.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemg35.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemg35.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemg35.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg40 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) ) -> ( ( P .\/ ( F ` ( G ` P ) ) ) ./\ W ) = ( ( Q .\/ ( F ` ( G ` Q ) ) ) ./\ W ) ) $.
